id: Death toll from Camp Fire rises to 76 as searchers find five more remains
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Nicole Chavez, Steve Almasy and Chandrika Narayan, CNNUpdated 10:26 PM ET, Sat November 17, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)The task is painstaking and painful. A searcher is given the name of someone who is unaccounted for and an address.CNN's Sara Weisfeldt, AnneClaire Stapleton, Dakin Andone, Faith Karimi, Joe Sutton, Nick Valencia, Amanda Watts and Dan Simon contributed to this report.
